text.autoconfig.chimpmode.title: Chimpmode Options
text.autoconfig.chimpmode.option.hideOff: Completely hide offhand items from rendering
text.autoconfig.chimpmode.option.offHand: Change the scale of offhand items
text.autoconfig.chimpmode.option.disable: Stops creating paths when right clicking with a shovel
Stops stripping logs when right clicking with an axe
